r.d: Zip is an extension to create, modify and read zip files.
r.n: - add ZipArchive::FL_RECOMPRESS, FL_ENCRYPTED, FL_OVERWRITE, FL_LOCAL, FL_CENTRAL constants - add optional "flags" parameter to ZipArchive::addEmptyDir, addFile and addFromString methods - add "flags" options to ZipArchive::addGlob and addPattern methods, keeping previous behavior having FL_OVERWRITE by default - add ZipArchive::replaceFile() method
